long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select an image using the "Image info" icon in the toolbar, and a popup will open, showing information about the image and a button to download it.
‚Ä¢ Supports background images, local images and SVG images.
‚Ä¢ Allows to select which image to inspect when several images are stacked.
‚Ä¢ Lets you decide which information to show:
    - Image source/address
    - File name
    - File type
    - File size
    - File date
    - Image dimensions
    - Image title
    - Image description
    - Full image preview
‚Ä¢ Allows to quickly show or hide all the information from the list above

üö´ No data is sent, nothing is tracked or recorded. Only your preferences are saved on your computer

v1.23.9.10:
‚Ä¢ Upgraded to Extension Manifest version 3 and updated code structure accordingly
‚Ä¢ Improved the detection and calculation of the images size, date and dimensions

v1.0.0.0:
‚Ä¢ Original version
